about_the_game:
Welcome to the world of Pico Drift, a racing game that puts your driving skills and reflexes to the test. Customize your car, master the art of drifting, and leave the competition in the dust.

After the race, dive into the in-game map editor to create your own drift playgrounds and unique challenges. Build a racetrack with carefully planned obstacles, or craft your own city district where you can race through traffic to outrun the cops. We plan to continuously expand the game with more building blocks and new themes.

Inspired by the iconic racing games of the 2000s and the creativity of modern sandbox titles, Pico Drift aims to deliver a competitive experience for speed enthusiasts!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or higher
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ I5 @ 2.5 GHz or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 1050 TI 4 GB / Radeon RX 570 8 GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or higher
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5 @ 4.1 GHz or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce RTX 2060 Super 8 GB / Radeon RX 5700 XT 8 GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: Explore the city as your ultimate drifting arena. Dodge traffic, outsmart the cops, and challenge your friends. Experience official campaign tracks and game modes, or create your own playgrounds. This is your world - drive it your way
